
#### Airline Passengers

```{r}
elec.ts    <- ts(CBE.df$elec, start = 1958, freq = 12);
AP.elec.ts <- ts.intersect(AP.ts, elec.ts);
```

```{r}
head(AP.elec.ts); tail(AP.elec.ts);

```

```{r}
str(AP.elec.ts);
```

```{r}
plot(AP.elec.ts);
```


#### Create a plot in ggplot2

```{r}
qplot(Var1, value, data = melt(AP.elec.ts), geom = 'line', colour = Var2);
```
